patterns: restro has how many different varities of cuisine
what are the different types of the cuisine
responses: Restro has all major varities of cuisine. American, Indian, Thai, Chinese, Japanese, French, Greek, Mexican, Taiwan, Italian.

patterns: How many chefs in your restro
responses: Restro has 2 head chefs and 20 subordinate chefs under them

patterns: what are the reviews of Restro?
responses: Our Restro is 5-star restro and we have average 4.7 ratings out of 5, Youn can also check our google reviews

patterns: what are the popular chinese dishes of your restro
responses: We provide a lot of chinese dishes like - Hotpot, Sichuan Pork, Braised Pork Balls in Gravy, Dumplings, Chow Mein, Peking Roasted Duck, Steamed Vermicelli Rolls and many more

patterns: what are the popular italian dishes of your restro
responses: We provide a lot of italian dishes like - Caprese Salad with Pesto Sauce, Panzenella, Bruschetta, Focaccia Bread, Pasta Carbonara, Margherita Pizza, Mushroom Risotto, Pasta Con Pomodoro E Basilico and many more

patterns: what are the popular Indian dishes of your restro
responses: We provide a lot of Indian dishes like - Hyderabadi Biryani, Masala Dosa, Pav Bhaji, Dhokla, Chole Bhature, Aloo Paratha, Paneer Tikka, Vada Pav, Dhokla and many more

patterns: what are the popular Mexican dishes of your restro
responses: We provide a lot of Mexican dishes like - Burritos with Minced Meat Filling, Chicken Quesadillas, Guacamole, Guilt-Free Chilli, Chilli Con Carne and many more
